lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Paul Volcker's resignation as Federal Reserve Board chairman creates a serious leadership vacuum at a time of deep uncertainty about the future management of the third-world debt crisis, bankers said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Another critic was Citicorp chairman John Reed, who said the 13/16 pct interest margin would deter some bank lenders and thus delay Mexico's return to the voluntary markets.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It was a review of the fate of the Mexican deal - and of others that followed it for Chile, Venezuela, the Philippines and Argentina - that helped to convince Reed that the debt crisis was not about to be solved and that Citicorp needed to bolster its reserves in case some of the loans went bad.
